src:
Live Streaming Crystal Palace vs Leicester City di Mola TV
03 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Leicester City harus memberikan penampilan terbaik mereka untuk menjaga momentum positif. Usai menang besar pekan lalu, kali ini mereka bakal menghadapi Crystal Palace pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20 di Selhurst Park, Minggu (3/11/2019) malam WIB.
Leicester selalu menang dalam tiga laga terakhir di Premier League. Bahkan, akhir pekan lalu, tim arahan Brendan Rodgres meraih kemenangan dengan skor telak 0-9 di kandang Southampton.
Leicester kini juga berada di ketiga klasemen dengan raihan 20 poin. The Foxes tentu ingin melanjutkan hasil positif yang sudah diraih. Jamie Vardy masih akan menjadi tumpuan mencetak gol. Vardy sejauh ini sudah mencetak sembilan gol.
Selain itu, Ayoze Perez kapasitasnya sudah tidak diragukan lagi. Pemain asal Spanyol mampu bermain bagus saat diberi kepercayaan Brendan Rodrgers. Mantan pemain Newcastle sejauh ini telah mencetak tiga gol di Premier League.
Sementara itu, tuan rumah Crystal Palace gagal menang dalam dua laga terakhir. Namun, jangan lihat hasil itu. Lihat lawannya. Palace kalah dari Manchester City dan menahan imbang Arsenal. Bukan hasil yang buruk bagi Palace.
Pelatih Roy Hodgson belum bisa memainkan Mamadou Sakhor di lini belakang. Namun, Hodgson bisa bertumpu pada Garry Cahill sebagai bek tengah. Mantan pemain Chelsea itu bisa diandalkan untuk menjaga Jamie Vardy.

Bolaneters dapat menyimak jadwal dan link streaming Watford vs Chelsea di bawah ini:
text:
Live Streaming of Crystal Palace vs Leicester City on Mola TV
Nov 03 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Leicester City must give their best performance to maintain positive momentum. After winning big last week, this time they will face Crystal Palace in the 11th week of the 2019/20 Premier League at Selhurst Park, Sunday (11/03/2019) evening hrs.
Leicester have always won in the last three matches in the Premier League. In fact, last weekend, the landing team Brendan Rodgres won with a landslide score of 0-9 at home to Southampton.
Leicester are now also in third place with 20 points. The Foxes certainly want to continue the positive results that have been achieved. Jamie Vardy will still be the goal of scoring. Vardy has scored nine goals so far.
In addition, Ayoze Perez has no doubt about its capacity. The Spaniard is able to play well when given the confidence of Brendan Rodrgers. The former Newcastle player has scored three goals so far in the Premier League.
Meanwhile, the host Crystal Palace failed to win in the last two matches. However, don't look at the results. Look at his opponent. Palace lost to Manchester City and drew Arsenal. Not a bad result for Palace.
Coach Roy Hodgson has not been able to play Mamadou Sakhor in the back line. However, Hodgson can rely on Garry Cahill as a central defender. The former Chelsea player can be counted on to protect Jamie Vardy.
